column2: Descedant of La Ferrassie, who was a great Neanderthal king whose hatred of Archaic was so great that he wiped out several Archaic kingdoms in revenge for his wife. He became the hero of many legends of the Neanderthal people and is still cited as an example of what a Neanderthal king should be like.

Descedant of Denny Homini, who was a great emperor of Denisovan Empire that united both his fellow Denisovan and the Aes Sidhe of the Archaics people under his strict but fair rule. Proclaimed as fearsome "Dark Lord", Denny Homini greatly expanded the borders of the Denisovan Empire by conquering the bordering realms of the Antecessor Archaics.

Descendant of Baishiya Karst, leader of the rebellion against rule of Overlord Denny. Having managed to unite the rebellious Denisovan warlords and the subjugated noble houses of the Antecessor Archaics under his rule, Baishiya Karst overthrew Denny and proclaimed himself the Bright Lord.
A child from this bloodline may be born as an Archaic
The Bright Ring considers the members of this bloodline as it's true masters
The Dark Ring considers the members of this bloodline as it's true masters
